articles.title: Donald Trump's family launches 'Made in America' T1 smartphone. Here's what it offers - Mint
articles.description: Donald Trump’s family launches Trump Mobile, a mobile phone service utilizing existing US carrier networks. The venture raises conflict of interest concerns as Trump retains business interests while in office.
